definition: state official or subject in dynastic China/I, your servant (used in addressing the sovereign)/Kangxi radical 131
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
state official or subject in dynastic China/I, your servant (used in addressing the sovereign)/Kangxi radical 131
courtier's or minister's form of address for the current Emperor
the (rightful) emperor/"Son of Heaven" (traditional English translation)
member of a monarch's inner ministerial circle (old)
enlightened sage/brilliant master (flattering words applied to ruler)
the most senior minister of many kingdoms or dynasties (with varying roles)/prime minister
former kings/former emperors/in Confucian writing, refers esp. to the sage rulers Yao 堯|尧[Yao2], Shun 舜[Shun4], Yu 禹[Yu3], Tang 湯|汤[Tang1] and the kings of Zhou
